column5: im heading down this weekend and i was just wondering if anybody is haveing any luck out their. Im going to hunt for wally's but if the arnt around ill catch bass or something

Well hay bay as well as the rest of the bay of quinte have a very good year round population of walleyes,and are there for the pickings !!!! they are mostly weed orientated,and will be along the edges,and the drops near the weed beds,try trolling x-raps,shad raps,and of course jigging berkley power minnows,and dont forget to fish the flats !!!! hope this helps...cheers
I was at Hay BAy yesterday and the fishing reports indicate TOUGH fishing, yet I saw a 29.5 inch fish that a 12 year old caught fishing with her grandparents.  Stay Tuned
